newsitem.title: USA: FHLMC sets $500 million of REMICs. [CORRECTED 19:01 GMT]
newsitem.headline: FHLMC sets $500 million of REMICs. [CORRECTED 19:01 GMT]

text.p: The Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac or FHLMC) said it issued $500 million of Real Estate Mortgage Investment Conduit (REMIC) Securities.

REMIC 1910, underwritten by Bear Sterns & Co Inc, has a coupon of 8.0 percent and is backed by 30-year single-family fixed-rate mortgages, Freddie Mac said. The issue has a weighted average coupon of 8.57 percent, a weighted average maturity of 356 months, a weighted average loan age of 4, and a prepayment speed estimated at 185 by the Public Securities Association (PSA). The issue priced on October 15 and has a settlement date of November 29 (Corrects), the agency said.
